short_summary: Purchase automatic bagging machine with delivery, installation, training, and maintenance in Montreal, Quebec, Canada
description: This bid solicitation is for the acquisition of an automatic bagging machine. Request for Proposal for goods.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Automatic Bagging Machine
## Brief Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of an automatic bagging machine.

## Background
This RFP cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation number W1941-250001, originally published on June 5, 2024 with a closing date of June 20, 2024. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who participated in the previous solicitation.

## Delivery Location and End User
The equipment will be delivered, installed, and maintained at the following location:
- Address: 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
- End User: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Contract Details
The following are relevant details regarding the contract:

* **Commodity Type**: Packaging machinery (UNSPSC Code: 23152900)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category: GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: This RFP is subject to the following trade agreements: 
  - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Annie Blanchet
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: Please refer to the attached link for the full tender notice: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20295997?extsite=MjAyOTU5OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
